I am responsible for this post office. If you have questions about the mail system or the depots, just ask me.
You can buy letters or parcels here which you by mail can send to whoever you want.

The depots are very easy to use. If you step on the switch infront of them your personal account is activated and you may store whatever you want inside the depot boxes. Anyone might use this system, it's free.
I'm Stephanie. My father is Stephan and my mother is Annie.
